events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to a sizing problem with the purchased jacket.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket due to sizing issues. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
My order number is 4583729. The jacket has not been worn and is still in the original packaging with all tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately upon receiving the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the item.
Great, I appreciate the quick response. Please send the shipping label at your earliest convenience.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support!
